summary: A comprehensive test suite that validates the MaskFormer model’s configuration, forward passes, attention outputs, auxiliary loss handling, generation without explicit input IDs, hidden state and embedding behavior, instance segmentation head functionality, pretrained loading, label processing, multi‑GPU data‑parallel execution, token embedding resizing, and gradient retention for hidden states and attentions.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness, stability and performance of the MaskFormer segmentation model across diverse scenarios to support reliable deployment in computer‑vision applications.
